notes: Unified compiler for cross-modal structured generation. Novel approach, inevitable with multi-modal models, massive value unlock. Technically feasible with proper architecture.
Standardized virtual memory management for agents. Strong inevitability as stateful agents scale. High technical feasibility building on Letta concepts.
CSP integration with LLM generation. Novel approach with high feasibility. Evidence from LMQL/DSPy shows market readiness.
Runtime optimization for function composition. Builds on DSPy/BAML success. Moderate technical challenges but clear value.
Bidirectional neural-symbolic translation. Highly novel but feasibility unclear. Long-term inevitability.
Microkernel architecture for LLM apps. Building on Letta concepts. High moat potential but complex implementation.
Standardized multi-agent protocols. High inevitability as multi-agent systems scale. Moderate technical complexity.
Distributed circuit breaker for LLMs. High feasibility and evidence. Lower novelty but practical value.
Git for prompts with semantic diffing. Moderate novelty, high feasibility. Clear practical need but limited moat.
Production profiler for LLM applications. Clear need and feasibility but limited novelty. Competitive market.
